post.body: No problem!
Stormy has left the building! lol So I wanted to respond to your question.
No, it's not spam. Smarter Agent just released our first version of our Real Estate by Smarter Agent app for the iPhone.
I look forward to hearing some feedback!
I'll only be there on Thursday, but I'm definitely looking forward to it!
NOOOoo! They already know about that! The NEW news!
Be Afraid...Be VERY AFRAID! And then have one for me! : )
I KNOW! Thus the train! Ridiculous!
I'm jealous! But at least I get to go on Thursday! : )
How about the fact they also charge $50/night for parking!?
That's why I can't even go in there to shop!
How about a gentleman's bet-2 dozen Philly pretzels and some Tastey Cakes against...what is good in MN? Go Eagles! ; )
Wait Stormy, before you go. Did you tell everyone yet?
I'm so bummed I won't be going with Stormy and Michelle for all of Inman! All the great people, technology and seminars!...Have fun for me!
Running home. Forgot my Notary seal! Geez!
Good morning....err...almost afternoon everyone! Hope you all had a good weekend! Safe travels for those of you heading to NYC for Inman.
Fly Eagles Fly!
Nice!
That's the Westbrook I know and love
wwww.smarteragent.com/brandinhand Check out how to put yourself in client's pocket 24/7 - and now we're available on the iPhone version1
